mmgenome2 2.0.12
  • Home

  • Functions

Reference

Loading and exporting data

Use mmload to load and merge metagenomic data, mmstats to show basic stats of the data, and mmexport to export the DNA sequences of binned scaffolds.

mmload()

Load and combine data for use with other mmgenome2 functions

mmstats()

Print basic statistics of metagenome data

mmexport()

Export DNA sequences of selected scaffolds

mmscanbins()

Retrieve scaffold names from all genome bins in a folder

mmmerge_linkfiles()

Load and merge files with mate-pair or paired-end connection information

Metagenome plotting and exploration

Functions for plotting metagenomes and identifying individual genomes.

mmplot()

Visualise metagenomes in various ways

mmplot_pairs()

Plot multiple combinations of variables in a pairs plot

mmplot_cov_profiles()

Compare coverage profiles

mmnetwork()

Network plot of mate-pair or paired-end connected scaffold reads

Extracting scaffolds from metagenomes

Functions for extracting individual genomes from metagenomes for further exploration or exportation with mmexport.

mmextract()

Extract all scaffolds within a selection polygon

mmexpand_network()

Find connections of a subset of scaffolds in a larger set of scaffolds

Contents

  • Loading and exporting data
  • Metagenome plotting and exploration
  • Extracting scaffolds from metagenomes
